author: Special Correspondent
text:
Actor Sai Prasanth (31) was found dead in his house in Maduravoyal on Sunday.

According to police sources, the actor’s father Subash alerted neighbours after Sai Prasanth did not answer calls. The neighbours found the door locked and informed the police. Sai Prasanth is suspected to have committed suicide by consuming poison. His body has been taken to Kilpauk Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: Actor found dead
